ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot
Class PlotBuilderAnnotation

java.lang.Object
  ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot.PlotBuilder
      ca.corefacility.gview.layout.plot.PlotBuilderAnnotation

public class PlotBuilderAnnotation
extends PlotBuilder

Defines a plot whose values are specified in terms of an annotation/data value ex. locus_tag, value

Author:
aaron
